programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team attend the funeral of a fallen colleague before resuming their hunt for the man they believe to be the port-to-port killer. Vance frantically researches the suspect's background to learn more about his motivations and discover who his next target could be - but one of the investigators follows a clue that leads to danger

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Tony tries to piece together the events that led to him lying wounded in a hospital bed, having been shot in the chest through his bulletproof vest. Under the guidance of therapist Dr Rachel Cranston, his memory begins to return and suspicion falls on his ex-lover EJ Barrett. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Sarah Jane Morris

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The investigators examine the death of US marine Tommy Hill, who appears to have been fatally stabbed en route to a homecoming party thrown in his honour by his foster family. McGee and Ziva follow a trail of blood that leads them to a mobile phone, while Abby discovers the victim had been trying to hack into Virginia's state website and Ducky's autopsy reveals that Hill had been injected with a sedative

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis uncovers evidence of police corruption that puts the DA's office into conflict with an ambitious judge, and Briscoe comes under investigation for stealing evidence from a police lockup. Crime drama, with Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A janitor is found murdered, leading the team to a schizophrenic student they discover has been part of an experimental drug programme. Though all evidence points to the youngster, it transpires that he had no motive to commit the crime and the police soon turn their attentions to a psychiatrist. Sam Waterston stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked car dealer whose son is dying of leukaemia presents McCoy and Ross with a moral dilemma. His ex-wife is their prime suspect - but it transpires that the victim had regularly abused her and refused to pay child support. Drama, starring Sam Waterston

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives probe the shooting of a motorist, and arrest a man who helped the victim change a tyre on his car shortly before he was killed. The suspect protests his innocence, and points the investigators in the direction of another man who admits to the crime and even signs a confession, but further inquiries cast doubt on his guilt. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a book editor who was reputedly having an affair with one of her authors, and find themselves focusing on the lover's long-time companion, whose alibi turns out to be a tissue of lies. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a model and discover splashes of blood that obviously did not come from the victim, but suggest the culprit is a relative. With Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: An undercover officer is killed during an operation to arrest a drug dealer, and Danny becomes obsessed with catching the person responsible. However, as his fixation with getting justice for his dead friend grows, Linda and the children worry about the effect the case is having on him. Meanwhile, Nicky and Henry prepare for a talent show

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The son of Fin's ex-wife stands trial for the rape and murder of a woman and her baby but, after having had the first case revoked, his lawyer tries to get him off the charges again by discrediting the SVU. Benson, Fin and Stabler are ordered to appear as witnesses for the defence in court, where questionable past decisions come back to haunt them. Guest starring Chris 'Ludacris' Bridges

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler investigate a case of alleged child abuse, but soon realise their attention should actually be focused on the woman who made the report. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A priest asks Stabler to meet a terminally ill man who has a secret he wants to share with his estranged daughter, leading the detective to discover the patient's involvement in a series of unsolved bank robberies during the 1970s. As the investigation progresses, they find a bomb shelter containing millions of dollars and the skeleton of his former partner-in-crime. Guest starring Brian Dennehy and Paget Brewster, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman accuses her estranged husband of breaking into her home and raping her. As the man has no history of violence and the victim refuses to allow her daughter to answer questions, the detectives are split over where the truth lies, and Benson is concerned that Stabler's judgement is being clouded by his own divorce. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Shade and Angie return to solve more cases in Toronto. The duo investigate the paranoid claims of a wealthy patriarch who thinks his enemies are out to get him

Thriller, starring James Coburn, Lee Grant, Harry Andrews and Ian Hendry

Starring Moira Shearer, Robert Rounseville, Robert Helpmann and Leonide Massine

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: The story of British Airways Flight 38, which was on final approach into London Heathrow Airport when it crashed just short of the runway on 17 January 2008. What had been an uneventful passenger flight from Beijing soon turned almost fatal just moments before landing when a lack of power to both engines caused the Boeing 777 to crash. The quick thinking by the crew led by Captain Peter Burkill prevented the incident from being fatal and saved all 152 people on board

programme.desc: Vince quits his job as tragedy strikes. Harvey and Barney meet an old friend

programme.title: Killing Dad (1989)
programme.desc: A drunken, out-of-work father writes to the family he abandoned 23 years before to say he wants to come home and ask their forgiveness. His estranged son is so alarmed that he sets off in a bid to kill his unwanted deadbeat dad before he has the chance to show up. Comedy, starring Denholm Elliott, Julie Walters, Richard E Grant and Anna Massey

programme.title: The Cat and the Canary (1978)
programme.desc: Friends and relatives of a dead millionaire gather for the reading of his will. A taped message from the deceased expresses his loathing of his legatees, and the conditions attached to the will are deliberately designed to have them at each other's throats. Moreover, it seems at least one of the potential beneficiaries is prepared to commit murder to guarantee getting the money. Thriller, starring Honor Blackman, Michael Callan and Edward Fox

programme.title: The Chase

programme.desc: The team visits Ellesmere Port, where a man tries to sell an unwanted Victorian writing slope.
